metadata.title: CVE-2012-2364 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in lib/filelib.php in Moodle 2.0.xbefore 2.0.9, 2.1.x before 2.1.6, and 2.2.x before 2.2.3 allows remoteauthenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via anassignment submission with zip compression, leading to text/html renderingduring a "download all" action.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-2364` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.5.4-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.4-1ubuntu1').
